item.title: TOOLS
item.description: This page is dedicated to tools, eBooks, and other interesting links. Name Description Link BDRSuite homepage BDRSuite is a robust and comprehensive backup solution that addresses various backup, recovery, replication and DR needs of your diversified IT infrastructure such as Virtual, Physical, Cloud workloads & SaaS Applications, and supports advanced use cases, thereby ensuring business continuity at affordable pricing.

item.title: Ivo Beerens - Solution Consultant
item.description: My name is Ivo Beerens, currently working as Solution Consultant specialized in virtualization technologies such as VMware SDDC, End-User Computing (EUC), Azure, Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD), Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Business Continuity (BC), and Disaster Recovery (DR). I’m awarded with the VMware vExpert title for 2011 till now, 14 years in a row.

item.title: Talk To Me Anytime :)
item.description: Ask Us Anything Or just Say Hi, Rather than just filling out a form, Sleeknote also offers help to the user with links directing them to find additional information or take popular actions.
